sentences.en: After his visit to South Africa, he will also continue to visit Tanzania and Uganda.
sentences.cn: 在结束对南非的访问后，他还将继续访问坦桑尼亚和乌干达。

sentences.en: Consumer uganda to cancel contract balance but if force result serious.
sentences.cn: 客户不答应取消剩余合同,如强迫其答应,则将产生严重后果.

sentences.en: Cotton is Uganda's second leading cash crop after coffee.
sentences.cn: 棉花是乌干达仅次于咖啡的创收型经济作物.

sentences.en: Farmers worry that a 2 nd disease could also spread to Uganda.
sentences.cn: 农民们担心另一种疾病可能也波及到了乌干达.

sentences.en: Five leaders of Uganda's rebel Lord's Resistance Army have already been indicted.
sentences.cn: 迄今已有5名乌干达反叛组织圣主抵抗军的头目遭指控.

sentences.en: In Uganda, Question Box formed a partnership with the Grameen Foundation.
sentences.cn: 在乌干达, 问题箱与乡村基金会建立了合作关系.

sentences.en: It was with some trepidation that I viewed the prospect of cycling across Uganda.
sentences.cn: 我带着些许惶恐考虑了一下骑自行车周游乌干达的可能性。

sentences.en: Many others, he says, have moved in with relatives in Gisenyi or crossed the border to Uganda.
sentences.cn: 他说，另外许多人搬到吉塞尼的亲戚家里，或者越过边境进入乌干达。

sentences.en: Our goal is peace for the children of northern Uganda - and 100,000 signatures.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标是乌干达北部儿童带来和平 - 以及100,000个签名.

sentences.en: Since 1992, HIV prevalence in Uganda has dropped by more than half.
sentences.cn: 自1992年以来, 乌干达的艾滋病感染减少了一多半.

sentences.en: Since 1992, HIV prevalence in Uganda has dropped by more than half.
sentences.cn: 因为从1992年起, HIV病毒在乌的流行度下降了一多半.

sentences.en: The findings, from Uganda, are in the medical journal lancet, The Lancet.
sentences.cn: 这些发现来自乌干达的一份医药刊物--柳叶刀.

sentences.en: The findings, from Uganda, are in the medical journal, Lancet.
sentences.cn: 研究结果出自乌干达并刊登在医学期刊《柳叶刀》上.

sentences.en: The IGAD region covers Djibouti, Eritrea, Ethiopia , Kenya, Somalia, Sudan, and Uganda.
sentences.cn: 伊加特所辖区域包括吉布提, 厄立特里亚, 埃塞俄比亚, 索马里, 苏丹和乌干达.

sentences.en: This is bad news for most Somalis — and for Uganda.
sentences.cn: 这对多数的索马里人都是不好的消息,对乌干达人来说也不妙.

sentences.en: Uganda began wide spread child vaccinations against HIB Hib in 2002.
sentences.cn: 在2002年乌干达开始广泛地使用针对Hib的疫苗接种.

sentences.en: Uganda's beautiful highlands are host to a wide range of wildlife.
sentences.cn: 乌干达美丽的高地是众多野生动物的栖息地。

sentences.en: You can spend one hour tracking here, whereas in Uganda it can take all day.
sentences.cn: 这里你只要花一小时既可以找到他们，但是在乌干达需要一整天。
